text:
@AP That's a shame, by this standard the @CanadianPM could be "warned" from making any further comments about the WHO, COVID19(84), the PMO's and to any child under the age of 17?

2.5m won't fix this Justin!

#TrudeauGate 
#ObaMAGAte 
#cdnpoli
